overview: Representative KPOP girl group 'Apink' Let's look back on the 10th anniversary of 'Apink', the group that has always been by our side!  What does the preparatory production stage for their 10th anniversary special album look like? The process from the 12/31 performance at the end of the 10th anniversary to the creation of the special album 'Horn' and the title song 'Dilemma'. Also, a commentary film for the fans who have been with us!
title: Apink Special Movie: Horn
